attributes.action: Stop the cutbacks at BBC WM in Birmingham
attributes.additional_details:
The Gov't should reverse much of its plans to cut back at BBC WM in Birmingham and Midlands area by :

1] Allowing the listener and viewer to have a much greater say on what and who should stay and go at the station/Mailbox, including the input and output of programming at the local radio station itself.

2] Allowing all TV programmes made at the Mailbox at present to carry on as normal and not be sent elsewhere, which is causing many to feel the area is being marginalised rather than supported by the Gov't.
